title: Not able to set myself to "away"?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: The gif pretty much explains itself, but basically every time I click the green "online" button to switch it to "away", it flickers for a second but instantly reverts back to showing me as online. In the gif I show myself mashing the button, and at the end I click it once without the mashing, both to the same effect. It's getting a little annoying as I've had this bug for a day or two (so restarting client/computer doesn't fix it), any solutions would really help me out :).

replies.body: I noticed that pretty shortly after the patch myself! It kinda sucks not being able to set yourself as away right now, but the devs are aware and are planning on getting that fixed up relatively soon!
